titleStmt.title: [The dreadfull day dolorous to the wicked. In two sermons. By William Leigh.]
titleStmt.author: Leigh, William, 1550-1639.

notesStmt.note: Pages missing and misnumbered; text is continuous.
Identified as STC 25423b on UMI microfilm.
Imperfect; title page and all following page 130 lacking.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
